title: API Problem
content: My API (from where this app get data) seem to stop working randomly. I'm very sorry for this since I'm in the middle of moving out for a month now I don't have so much time, it should be over by the end of the week if everything goes as planned. In the same time I will restart the api every day. Sorry again for all of this...

title: Baka-Tsuki Maintenance Over
content: Mantenance is over everything should work as expected

title: Baka-Tsuki Maintenance
content: Baka-Tsuki will likely be down for maintenance for periods of time between May 20th and May 22nd, 2016
